item.title: Cypherpunk Bitstream 0x09: Security III — The Future of Security
item.author: contact@taz0.org (TAZ 0)
item.description:
We talk about the future of security: future threats, technological empowerment, defence strategy in general, and example defence technology (anon comms, delay&disruption tolerant networking, long-range autonomous cargo drones, etc.).

The is also a somewhat higher quality version of the MP3.

item.title: Cypherpunk Bitstream 0x08: Pandemic II — Police State
item.author: contact@taz0.org (TAZ 0)
item.description:
We talk with Arto Bendiken about the political reactions to the ongoing pandemic and their long term effects on: Economy, free speech, mass gatherings, biodefense, cash, infection control, and identity.

The is also a higher quality version of the MP3.

item.title: Cypherpunk Bitstream 0x07: Pandemic I
item.author: contact@taz0.org (TAZ 0)
item.description: Frank Braun talks with Arto Bendiken about the ongoing Coronavirus pandemic (COVID-19). How did we get here and what convinced us to prep. Paranoia, case fatality rates, and vaccines. Secondary and tertiary effects. Normalcy, authority, and confirmation bias.

item.title: Cypherpunk Bitstream 0x06: Security II
item.author: contact@taz0.org (TAZ 0)
item.description: We talk about major threats to security, mainly focussed on future threats and the reaction from security services. Some keywords are: Nuclear proliferation, robotic warfare, technology regulation, surveillance state, bioterrorism, and omniviolence.

item.title: Cypherpunk Bitstream 0x05: Security I
item.author: contact@taz0.org (TAZ 0)
item.description: We talk about security and the current state of the security system (police, intelligence services, and the military).

item.title: Cypherpunk Bitstream 0x04: Dropgangs
item.author: contact@taz0.org (TAZ 0)
item.description: In this episode we talk about Dropgangs, lock boxes, dead drops, drone mix networks, and sneakernet.

item.title: Cypherpunk Bitstream 0x03: TAZ
item.author: contact@taz0.org (TAZ 0)
item.description: In this episode we talk about Temporary Autonomous Zones, containers, the OODA loop and reply to listener questions.

item.title: Cypherpunk Bitstream 0x02: Second Realm
item.author: contact@taz0.org (TAZ 0)
item.description: In this episode we talk about “The Second Realm”: Is more liberty possible? Parallel systems, conflict management, temporary autonomous zones, and The Sovereign Individual.

item.title: Cypherpunk Bitstream 0x01: Cryptoanarchy
item.author: contact@taz0.org (TAZ 0)
item.description: In this episode we talk about “What is Cryptoanarchy?": We cover a definition of cryptoanarchy, anonymous messaging, the cryptoanarchy technology pyramid, an alternative vision for the future, and many more topics.

item.title: Cypherpunk Bitstream 0x00: Introduction
item.author: contact@taz0.org (TAZ 0)
item.description: In this episode we introduce the Cypherpunk Bitstream podcast.
